title: Population in China 2008 - 2018 , by gender
summary: Overall Male, and Female are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of Population in million inhabitants, in descending order is: 1. Male, and lastly, 2. Female.
Female reported the lowest Population in million inhabitants about 653.43 in Year 2010
The greatest difference of Population in million inhabitants between Male and Female occurs at Year 2010 and the smallest difference occurs at 2017.
